item.title: Static sites and Node.js

item.title: Hidden Markov Model based Speech Recognition on Embedded Hardware
item.description: My university third year project (dissertation) was an investigation into the capabilities of embedded hardware for performing modern speech recognition. This article summarises my progress and findings.

item.description: Because I wanted to script my Bus Pirate, the Ruby bindings weren‘t working and I’d prefer not to use Python.

item.title: LTIB Build and Install Instructions
item.description: A terse guide to setting up the LTIB build host environment. Nowadays you should probably be using something more modern though, like OpenEmbedded.

item.title: Homebuilt electric guitar
item.description: Actually it was mainly built in my old school‘s workshop, but my basement saw its fair share too. I built this as part of a school project, and it’s definitely something I'll do again one day.

item.title: Guitar Effect Pedals (stompboxes)
item.description: Before I really got interested in electronics, I mainly coded a lot. Then I started building effect pedals for my electric guitar.
